extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the feeling of speed and power, cool racing car picture with 3d effects in this death car racing Android free game.If you enjoyed speed racing, you will like this game!This game is so easy but super fun. You can play with your friends.There are THREE games!Game 1 - Puzzle Game : 12 most outstanding and wonderful photo. Drag the pieces into the right place to recreate the image!Game 2 - Brick Game: Change the block to fit each other!Game 3 - Memory Game: Pair the same photo.It is a 100 levels of brick game.There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage.Once you complete each levels, you will love this game very much!!Tips on Scoring:The more blocks you clear, the more score you will get.Other features:- You can pause the game and resume later.- We've put together the best collection of death race movie, death race crash video and world greatest racing.DISCLAIMER: All names, trademarks and images are copyright their respective owners. The use of any names, copyrights, trademarks or photos have been used for Descriptive Purposes only and not to show endorsement or permission to use. This is completely unofficial, and created for fans.This app made by fans for fans, and it's for entertainment and personal purposes only.
